title: Morning Song
excerpt: Holy corrective lens, / Tao / frosted of 40 watts. / Premature spun from the womb, / caught up in the / be and / be and be.
fullText:
Holy corrective lens,
Tao
frosted of 40 watts.

Premature spun from the womb,
caught up in the
be and
be and be.

Morning's adjective wash,
drying
on the line
in a
beard pointing sunriseâ€”

tumbling, visceral communion
with my dead.
I met me waking,
a grape eating youth.
That spectre.
